name: Mamak City
description:
Mamak City is currently a prototype that is developed for a Final Year Project from Malaysia. It is inspired by the gameplay of Restaurant City and TasteMaker: A Restaurant Simulator. In Mamak City, you get to experience the idea of operating and managing a restaurant specifically Mamak food (Indian Muslim Cuisine). 

Main Features:

  • Simulation System (AI)
  • Food Management
  • Restaurant Customisation (Grid-Based)

Note:

  1. Maximum Level and Rating is 100
  2. Every 5 Level waiter and chef maximum capacity increases by 1.
  3. Saving and Loading does not save customer's progress. (All customers in the restaurant will not be saved).

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Rotation: Holding right click and drag

Selecting objects: Build Mode: None
